Source.name: EBS Sensor: HCM HR Shared HR Profiles DateTrac Enabled HR Enable DTW4 not allowed to be active in shared HR - Monthly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: HCM HR Shared HR Profiles DateTrac Enabled HR Enable DTW4 not allowed to be active in shared HR - Monthly
Source.Description: These profiles are only allowed to be active and used within fully installed Oracle Human Resources environments.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_HCM_HR_INCORRECT_PROFILE_SHARED' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'Profile_name:' || s.Profile_name || ', Context_profile:' || s.Context_profile || ', Level_profile:' || s.Level_profile || ', Value_profile:' || s.Value_profile key_data FROM (select PROFILE_OPTION_NAME Profile_name, Context_profile Context_profile,Level_profile Level_profile,Value_profile Value_profile from ( Select fpotl.PROFILE_OPTION_NAME, decode(to_char(fpov.level_id), '10001', 'Site', '10002', 'Application') Context_profile, fpo.APPLICATION_ID, fpov.LEVEL_VALUE, decode(to_char(fpov.level_id), '10001', 'Site', '10002', nvl(app.application_short_name,to_char(fpov.level_value))) Level_profile, DECODE(fpov.PROFILE_OPTION_VALUE,'Y','Yes', DECODE(fpov.PROFILE_OPTION_VALUE,'N','No', fpov.PROFILE_OPTION_VALUE)) Value_profile from apps.FND_PROFILE_OPTIONS fpo, apps.FND_PROFILE_OPTIONS_TL fpotl, apps.FND_PROFILE_OPTION_VALUES fpov, apps.FND_APPLICATION app where fpotl.PROFILE_OPTION_NAME = fpo.PROFILE_OPTION_NAME and app.application_id (+) = fpov.level_value and fpo.PROFILE_OPTION_ID = fpov.PROFILE_OPTION_ID and fpotl.LANGUAGE = 'US' and ((fpo.PROFILE_OPTION_NAME like 'DATETRACK:ENABLED' and fpotl.PROFILE_OPTION_NAME like 'DATETRACK:ENABLED' and fpov.PROFILE_OPTION_ID = 1208 and fpov.LEVEL_ID IN (10001,10002) and fpov.LEVEL_VALUE != '804') or (fpotl.PROFILE_OPTION_NAME = 'PER_ENABLE_DTW4' and fpo.PROFILE_OPTION_NAME = 'PER_ENABLE_DTW4' and fpov.LEVEL_ID IN (10001,10002) and fpo.APPLICATION_ID = 800) ) AND exists (select 1 from apps.FND_PRODUCT_INSTALLATIONS where APPLICATION_ID = 800 and status='S') )) s
